title: Kingdom of Wishes
description: With Gothel gone, Aladdin and Cassian desperately try to cover up their involvement in her disappearance.But Aladdin is soon to face his next opponent and tensions are running high amongst the competitors.With everything on the line Aladdin must decide whether a lifetime of wealth is worth the huge risks he's taking, or if it is better to turn tail and run.And with his eye set on Princess Rapunzel as his prize, he must try not to be distracted by the alluring genie who accompanies him.Book 2 in the Forbidden Fairytales Series. This is an Aladdin and Rapunzel mash-up retelling suitable for Upper YA readers. Expect some violence, swearing and sexual references.
author: Caroline Peckham
